Flicker/Phoenix/Skyblaze/Pumpskin::

"Our last battle was not a pretty one," Flicker agrees, "but we gave 
as good as we got.  In any event, with all the new recruits, the 
Maximals are in deep slag next time."

A newcomer enters the room, a green robot with an orange jack-o-
lantern head and four lashing tentacles sprouting from his back in 
addition to the normal set of limbs.  Phoenix shudders and pulls 
closer to Flicker, having been the only member of the group who was 
around when Pumpskin joined the Predacons.

"Better be careful, guys," she whispers.  "That pumpkin's missing a 
few seeds, if you take my meaning."  She means, of course, that this 
particular Pred belongs in a rubber-lined stasis pod - which was 
actually where they found him.

"Eeheehee, hello everyone."  A sickening cackle rattle emanates from 
Pumpskin's fanged mouth.  "What's this, new Predacons?  Oh, goody!"

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "raccoon7679" <raccoon7679@y...> wrote:
> Battera::
> 
> She walked around the mess hall and returned back to her table. She 
> was using her hightened hearing and sonic wave hear what was being 
> said about the room. So far, other than Flicker showing her no 
trust, 
> which was expected from a pred, she didn't find a clue to 
> Nightlight's where abouts. She wasn't going ot give up yet. She 
> looked at Flicker. "So how many of us are there. I over heard some 
> bots talking earlier about getting the slag kicked out of them from 
> the maximals in a previous battle. I hope this will not be the case 
> in the future? I do not wish to be imprisioned again by those weak 
> sparked, waste of metal fools."
